about_the_game:
Overview:

"ChanceBall" is an exciting 2D volleyball game perfect for those who love fast-paced sports action with a mix of strategy and skill. It offers local multiplayer with support for both keyboard and controllers, making it a great party game.

Game Modes:

  • Normal Mode: Classic volleyball action where the only difference is that one team can touch the ball 4 times. Players can engage in intense matches, perfecting their skills and competing against friends or AI.
  • Ability Clash Mode: Take the competition up a notch with special abilities. Strategically use these abilities to outplay your opponents.
  • Free Play Mode: Practice and hone your skills in a relaxed environment. Use the ball cannon to simulate different scenarios, perfect your hits, and experiment with various abilities to discover your favorite playstyle.

Key Features:

Local Multiplayer: Play with or against friends, with keyboard and controller support for up to 4 players.
Skill-Based Gameplay: Offers a variety of hit options that require precise timing, ensuring that skill is the key to victory.
Abilities: Utilize unique abilities, adding a layer of strategy and unpredictability to the game.
Practice Mode: Use Free Play with a ball cannon to refine your techniques and test out different abilities.
Artificial Intelligence Bots: Test your skills against different level bots.

"ChanceBall" - Every BALL that comes your way is a CHANCE to outplay and dominate the court!
